lines.text: I told you before it was over between us both and now you kill people.
Why don't you want me anymore?
We're not in there anymore Zack! I tried to make a life for myself and now you've gone and fucked it all up!
But I did it for you and I did it for us! You said nothing was going to come between us... nobody!
That was different we needed each other!
It was not different to me!
Yeah well it should've been, but it doesn't matter anyway... your're going back inside forever this time.
I'm never going back... never... you lying bastard

[sees Zack racing towards her]
He's coming back
What are you doing? We've gotta clean our home... make it nice again!

[dying]
He was my... friend... in prison... the other convicts used to hurt him... so I took care of him... in six years we were locked up together... I was all he had... And at one time he was all I had... After we got out he kept coming around... and after I broke it off... he kept pursuing me... I tried to stay on the straight and narrow... I'm sorry Mr. Robbins... I...
